channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Consistent fly tipping on street/all through alleyway behind shops., 27th January
item.description:
This spot is a hotspot for fly tipping. Itâ€™s rarely cleaned up and encourages people to continue to use it as a dump. It attracts pests. Please reach out to discuss and potential resolutions we could implement to avoid ongoing issues with fly tipping g

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Regan Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light out for months, 27th January
item.description:
Street Light not working despite it being reported as Fixed twice since the original report in October 2025. Unfortunately making false claims undermines confidence in the whole process. In other words: What's the point of reporting a problem if nothing is being done about the issue, and the official response is not true. I have staff who leave in the dark on an unlit pavement, that's why this important to us. Next door is a restaurant from which people leave directly into an unlit cycle path. It is an accident waiting to happen.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Wandsworth Road, Vauxhall, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The traffic lights here are all out, 27th January
item.description:
The traffic lights and pedestrian crossing lights have not been working for several days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West End Lane, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Wooden Pallets Fly tipped, 27th January
item.description:
There has been fly tipping of wooden pallets on the pavement next to the Superdrug side entrance used for deliveries on Merrow Street since yesterday. The pallets are obstructing the pavement and pedestrian access. Large fly tipped items are typically not moved far from where they originate. Given the recurring issues in this area, it may be worth considering Merrow Street as a fly tipping hotspot so it can be monitored more closely.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Merrow Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
